docs.lead_paragraph: Back to Ohio Senator Robert A. Taft heads homeward to Ohio this week after a three-week tour of seven Far Western states. The trip had two purposes. One was to carry out his own advice that "the issues before the country" be "freely discussed * * * particularly by Republicans."
